verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] [V: relaunched] [ARG1: his call for a Space Force] and used a National Space Council meeting to direct the Pentagon ASAP to create a new command in the Defense Department .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] relaunched his call for a Space Force and [V: used] [ARG1: a National Space Council meeting] [ARG2: to direct the Pentagon ASAP to create a new command in the Defense Department] .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] on Monday relaunched his call for a Space Force and used a National Space Council meeting to [V: direct] [ARG1: the Pentagon] [ARGM-ADV: ASAP] [ARG2: to create a new command in the Defense Department] .

President Donald Trump on Monday relaunched his call for a Space Force and used a National Space Council meeting to direct [ARG0: the Pentagon ASAP] to [V: create] [ARG1: a new command in the Defense Department] .
